unnormalised: ## Bollywood Blunders and Band Baaja Bites: Your Weekly Dose of Masala!
normalised: Bollywood Blunders and Band Baaja Bites: Your Weekly Dose of Masala!

unnormalised: Namaste, gossipy friends! Your weekly dose of Bollywood bakwas is here, hotter than a plate of Hyderabadi biryani on a Chennai summer day! Let's dive into the celebrity chaat, shall we?
normalised: Namaste, gossipy friends! Your weekly dose of Bollywood bakwas is here, hotter than a plate of Hyderabadi biryani on a Chennai summer day! Let's dive into the celebrity chaat, shall we?

unnormalised: First up, whispers are swirling faster than a dandiya stick at Navratri about Ranbir Kapoor's… shall we say, *interesting* fashion choices at a recent award show. Apparently, his stylist is taking inspiration from a peacock on a particularly bad hair day. Twitterati are having a field day, comparing his outfit to everything from a dish sponge to a heavily embellished autorickshaw. Honestly, even my nani, who's been rocking the same sari since 1972, has more sartorial sense.
normalised: First up, whispers are swirling faster than a dandiya stick at Navratri about Ranbir Kapoor's… shall we say, interesting fashion choices at a recent award show. Apparently, his stylist is taking inspiration from a peacock on a particularly bad hair day. Twitterati are having a field day, comparing his outfit to everything from a dish sponge to a heavily embellished autorickshaw. Honestly, even my nani, who's been rocking the same sari since one thousand nine hundred and seventy two, has more sartorial sense.

unnormalised: Then there's the alleged "friendship" between Alia Bhatt and Janhvi Kapoor. Sources (read: my cousin who works as a chaiwala on set) tell me there was some serious *eye-daggers* being thrown at Karan Johar's Diwali party. Apparently, both ladies are vying for the lead role in his next Dharma Productions mega-budget flick. Looks like the battle for Bollywood queen bee is heating up hotter than a tandoor oven!
normalised: Then there's the alleged "friendship" between Alia Bhatt and Janhvi Kapoor. Sources (read: my cousin who works as a chaiwala on set) tell me there was some serious eye-daggers being thrown at Karan Johar's Diwali party. Apparently, both ladies are vying for the lead role in his next Dharma Productions mega-budget flick. Looks like the battle for Bollywood queen bee is heating up hotter than a tandoor oven!

unnormalised: Speaking of competition, rumors are rife that Deepika Padukone is secretly learning to play the tabla. Why? Apparently, Ranveer Singh's new passion is classical Indian music, and she’s trying to impress his *chacha* who’s a tabla maestro. Good luck with that, Deepika! Even Shankar Mahadevan struggles with the tabla.

Apparently, Ranveer Singh's new passion is classical Indian music, and she’s trying to impress his chacha who’s a tabla maestro. Good luck with that, Deepika! Even Shankar Mahadevan struggles with the tabla.

unnormalised: And finally, the scandalous scoop of the week: Apparently, a certain superstar (whose name rhymes with "Salman Khan," wink wink) was spotted at a Dhaba 50 km outside Mumbai, enjoying a plate of vada pav... *gasp*… WITHOUT onions! The horror! The utter lack of respect for culinary tradition! The internet is already calling for a boycott. The apocalypse is nigh!
normalised: And finally, the scandalous scoop of the week: Apparently, a certain superstar (whose name rhymes with "Salman Khan," wink wink) was spotted at a Dhaba fifty kilometer outside Mumbai, enjoying a plate of vada pav... gasp… WITHOUT onions! The horror! The utter lack of respect for culinary tradition! The internet is already calling for a boycott. The apocalypse is nigh!

unnormalised: That's all the masala for this week, folks! Keep your ears to the ground, your eyes peeled, and your gossip ready. Until next time, keep it spicy! And remember, all of this is just harmless fun... unless it's true, of course. ;)
